name: MI Lab Recreation
description:
Recreation of my workspace as a researcher. All the details were recalled from memory.

Commands:

  • WASD / Arrows: to navigate
  • Mouse: to look around
  • ESC: make cursor appear

Assets used are mainly from Synty Studios' Polygon Office Pack:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/polygon-office-pack-159492
